---

A _dezullon fountain_ is a distinct type of _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [air repeater](/Weapons.aspx?ID=188)_ made from the still-living pitcher of a [dezullon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=115), dealing acid damage instead of the gun's normal piercing damage.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The next creature you successfully Strike with this weapon is exposed to amnesia venom.

 **Amnesia Venom** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 29 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) (1 round); **Stage 2** off-guard and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 3** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5), off-guard, and clumsy 2 (1 round)

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a pitcher from a dezullon or similar creature.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
